Try out the NearFarms site http://farmerbo.herokuapp.com

NearFarms Online Marketplace Web Application

Full-stack mobile application developed for NearFarms startup. The platform allows farmers to upload produce and automatically allocate to inventory of local farmers markets. Consumers can browse available produce and order to be picked up at their local market.

Client

NearFarms

Duration

2 weeks
